Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1981...
Injured on 6/8/1985 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1986, off Bud Black (HOU)...
Injured on 9/15/1987 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1990, hitting .516 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to PIT: 3B P. Nevin. Going to NYM: LF K. Mitchell)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1993, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 6/28/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1995, hitting .364 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
